Description: Green steatite scarab, decorated with a representation of a standing figure of king wearing blue crown, offering to Ptah in shrine, with hieroglyphs, including the name of Ramses 2, above.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: F A F Mariette (?)
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (2195)
